mainText:
My condolences are towards everyone who knew Steve Jobs and had him as a 
family member, friend, coworker, and even those people who just bought 
his products. I was one of the people who really did not know much about 
him personally, but I think back to the small flip phones and thank this 
man and his company for creating my iPhone 3GS and iPad. This is a loss 
like no other, and I am praying for everyone involved.
header: Remembering the Founder of the Greatest Company for Entertainment
author: Lauren
